vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δόλος

__B· πάσσαλος, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily a bait or contrivance for entrapping, fraud, deceit, cunning, guile, slyness, trickery, as a figurative extension of the base meaning (not used in the NT) of trapping an animal by baiting or by cunning; primarily a bait or contrivance for entrapping, fraud, deceit, cunning, guile, Mt. 26:4; Mk. 7:22; 14:1
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 狡詐, 詭計, 詭詐
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 狡诈, 诡计, 诡诈
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: dối trá, lừa đảo, láu cá, thủ đoạn, mưu mẹo, mánh khoé (nhằm dỗ dành, lừa gạt, lôi kéo ai)
